author: OrchidAlloy
description: Lets you configure emojis that will be added to any message containing specific text.
install_msg:
‚è∫ __**Autoreact**__
```Autoreact cog installed. Instructions:
1. Load it with [p]load autoreact
2. Start adding emojis to specific text with [p]autoreact add [emoji] [text]```
short: Reacts to specific messages with emojis.
